meanings.definition: Inclined to analyze or scrutinize excessively.
meanings.sent1: She is overanalytical when it comes to making decisions.
meanings.sent2: He tends to be overanalytical about his school assignments.
meanings.sent3: The overanalytical student spent hours dissecting a simple math problem.
meanings.sent4: Her overanalytical nature turned a minor issue into a major dilemma.
meanings.sent5: The overanalytical approach to problem-solving often leads to indecision.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive analysis or scrutiny.
meanings.sent1: The overanalytical report contained unnecessary details.
meanings.sent2: Their overanalytical behavior caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent3: The overanalytical detective missed the obvious clue right in front of them.
meanings.sent4: His overanalytical mind never allowed him to enjoy simple pleasures.
meanings.sent5: The overanalytical approach to the problem only complicated matters further.
